Дата Время Темп. Влаж. Точка росы Давление Напр. ветра Скорость ветра Облачность Граница облачности Горизонт. видимость
{{ weather.date }} {{ weather.time }} {{ weather.temperature }} {{ weather.humidity }} {{ weather.dewPoint }} {{ weather.presure }} {{ weather.windDirection }} {{ weather.windSpeed }} {{ weather.cloudy }} {{ weather.highBorderCloudy }} {{ weather.horizontalVisibility }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public weathers: Weather[] = []; public pageNum: number = 1; public selectedMode: string = "all"; getData() { this.http.get('https://localhost:7145/WeatherAPI?PageNum=' + String(this.pageNum)).subscribe(result => { this.weathers = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } constructor(public http: HttpClient) { this.getData(); } } interface Weather { date: string; time: string; temperature: number; humidity: number; dewPoint : number; presure: number; windDirection: string; windSpeed: number; cloudy: number; highBorderCloudy: number; horizontalVisibility: number; }
